ingredients.ingredient: 1 (1 ounce) package dry onion soup mix

cookingTips: Butter helps create a flavorful fond on the bottom of the pot for deglazing
Apple juice adds natural sweetness that complements pork beautifully
Quick release pressure after cooking to prevent the meat from overcooking
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Help the user understand how onion soup mix provides seasoning depth while apple juice adds sweetness. Suggest this as a simple weeknight meal.
